Peter Petrelli.action: Floats above a crowded sidewalk, rocking slowly and rhythmically in mid-air, unnoticed by the crowd except one man.
Peter Petrelli.assessment: Peter's hovering above the crowd without causing alarm or disturbance shows a non-threatening presence and restraint, which can be seen as respectful and considerate, subtle indicators of warmth.

Peter Petrelli.assessment: This sequence shows advanced aerial maneuvering skills and precise control, reflecting strong competence in using his powers effectively and safely in a complex urban environment.
